creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Panel of straw-colored k'ossu with medallion in center and a floral spray in each corner. Blue, red, green, pink, gold-color and tan. Wide border of Ming-type brocade with all-over design of floral medallions, fungus forms and small blossoms in blue, green, and tan on light tan satin ground. Lining of gold-colored raw silk of cloud design.
title: Panel
